subject: Testing inner classes with junitx
msgSnippet: Does anyone know if inner classes can be tested with junitx?  I need to test a private method that returns an instance of an inner class. Thanks, Leila
messageBody:
Does anyone know if inner classes can be tested with
junitx? I need to test a private method that returns
an instance of an inner class.

Thanks,
Leila
